subject: Order #SSN4870
description_text:
Hi

I would like to ask about an order I placed on December 15, what is
the situation, I haven't heard anything about it yet?

conversations.body_text: Hi mika nevalai,       I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2535100703277135

Yes, I have received it. The package arrived after sending the message. The
product is good, thank you.

On Thu, Jan 15, 2026 at 12:30â€¯PM service@simsonn.com
Hi mika nevalai,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
